message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you my premium product. Given its exceptional value, I'm setting the price at $14000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to you. I look forward to your positive response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. However, considering my budget constraints, I can offer you $9000 for it. I hope we can reach a deal that satisfies both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but given the value of the product, I believe $11500 is a more reasonable price. This is a significant reduction from my initial offer. I hope we can meet halfway.
